text: @Naveen_Odisha Sir... Plz don't allow.. To moving Train in our. State.. To delhi.. Ya other states.. Bcz.. Some villagers thinking.. Covid19.. Gone away.. As usual.. U come from train. And staying ur.. Home.. Plz. Plz. Plz.. Sir.. Now we are going in critical.. Conditions.. Plz.. Sir..
